resp.Feature name: Real-time status of the place of use in CMS
resp.Brief description: Update the connection status of the place of use to CMS in real time.

resp.Feature name: Include user interface error codes in the AVR document
resp.Brief description: Add industry error codes related to the user interface to the published FD.CMD.AVR document.

resp.Feature name: Changing the customer's name to the date of the customer's identifier
resp.Brief description: Fix a bug where the operator's customer identification update does not consider possible name updates.

resp.Feature name: New validation rule for event DH-124-1
resp.Brief description: Block the validation rule update requests for user location information, requesting user group BE14.

resp.Feature name: Do not accept to update the annual usage estimate if the value does not change
resp.Brief description: Do not allow the update event of the annual usage estimate if it contains the information already found in Datahub.

resp.Feature name: Operator cancellation development
resp.Brief description: Develop the contract cancellation process used by the Datahub operator to automate email messages.

resp.Feature name: Search for measurement data in the user interface
resp.Brief description: Proposal related to the search for measurement data, which has been found to be a driver-oriented problem that does not require development.

resp.Feature name: Transmission of measurement data in connection with retroactive contract changes
resp.Brief description: Automatically send ongoing measurement data in connection with the initiation of retroactive contracts.

resp.Feature name: Measurement information reminders when a disconnected object is reported consumption
resp.Brief description: Send a reminder of what was reported to the disconnected object of consumption only once.

resp.Feature name: New type 'Communication contact information' party contact for information
resp.Brief description: Transfer contact information for data exchange from the Datahub Services portal to Datahub.

resp.Feature name: Mutual selection of annual usage estimate and time zone information
resp.Brief description: Find out whether there is conflicting information in Datahub where two annual usage estimates have been reported for this location or vice versa.

resp.Feature name: Use of message ID for connection and disconnection notifications in mediation
resp.Brief description: Use message ID for connection and disconnection notifications in mediation.

resp.Feature name: List of places of use of the authorized business customer
resp.Brief description: List of places of use getting it from Datahub would reduce the work for everyone when 3rd parties would not have to figure out how to get it from a customer or network company.

resp.Feature name: Energy production type visible to 3rd parties
resp.Brief description: Make energy production type visible to 3rd parties.

resp.Feature name: Review date for reports
resp.Brief description: Add the proposed review date information for reports.

resp.Feature name: Validation of information arriving at Datahub
resp.Brief description: Validate the information arriving at Datahub.

resp.Feature name: Development of the Open Events report
resp.Brief description: Develop a report for the review and processing of open events.

resp.Feature name: Changes to the measurement data search view
resp.Brief description: Make changes to the measurement data search view.

resp.Feature name: Blocking a connection request if there is no previous disconnection request
resp.Brief description: Block a connection request if there is no previous disconnection request.

resp.Feature name: Review date field to be active in the place of use view
resp.Brief description: Make the review date field active in the place of use view.

resp.Feature name: Report on places of use by vendor
resp.Brief description: Generate a report on places of use by vendor.

resp.Feature name: Mandatory time step in DH-122-1 message
resp.Brief description: Make the time step mandatory in the DH-122-1 message.

resp.Feature name: Mandatory measuring range DH-126-1- and DH-127-1-sano
resp.Brief description: Make the measuring range mandatory in DH-126-1- and DH-127-1-sano.

resp.Feature name: Your connection delays delay in application
resp.Brief description: Bring information about safe connection to Datahub.

resp.Feature name: Changing the format of the usage location ID
resp.Brief description: Change the format of the usage location ID.
